meanings: [명사] self-reliance, [동사] stand on one's own (two) feet

vlive.korean: 저 친구들은 굉장히 자립심이 강한 친구들이기 때문에 알아서 잘... They'll be cooked well on their own. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [다영] 다영이의 요리교실🍳 Ep.08
vlive.english: They'll be cooked well on their own.

vlive.korean: 노숙인들의 자립을 지원하는 빅이슈라는 잡지가 있습니다. There's a magazine called, "Big Issue," that supports independence for the homeless. 듣기 View video FNC NEOZ SCHOOL : [CNBLUE 정신 X AOA 설현] LOVE FNC 미얀마 봉사활동기 해피빈 기부라이브
vlive.english: There's a magazine called, "Big Issue," that supports independence for the homeless.

vlive.korean: 자... 자립심? Jaripsim (sense of independence)? 듣기 View video BTS : WORLD WIDE HANDSOME JIN Day🎂 Live
융통성이 없고. 차갑도록 자립적이긴 하지만. Lack of flexibility, and too independent. 듣기 View video Boys Republic : 놀쟈앙~~!!!
vlive.english: Lack of flexibility, and too independent.

vlive.korean: 엄마랑 안 잤어요, 어렸을 때? - 제가 좀 자립심이 많아서... Never used to sleep with your mom? - I didn't. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 본격 소통 방송 - 여보세요7
vlive.english: Never used to sleep with your mom? - I didn't.
